summary: Very simple mod that allows Imperial Soliders to spawn with Penitus Oculatus armor
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffa500][size=6][font=times new roman,times,serif][b]Need yo help![/b][/font][/size][/color]
I was wondering does anyone reading this know the original creators of the following mods?
If you do please ask them if it's ok if I use the assets from there mod in a mod I'm making or just ask them to log in for two seconds so they can respond to my PM. Thank you very much.

 - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6443//?]Dark Brotherhood Hide Shield[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2817912]RitchieTheMerc[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5472//?]Tartan Furs[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2283993]Callaghan04[/url]
 - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2721/?]AEterna Rings[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1295233]aeterna826[/url]
 - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/433//?]Donkey Kong Country Barrels[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3135078]PaulHoffman[/url]


[color=#ffa500][size=6][font=times new roman,times,serif][b]Quick Description[/b][/font][/size][/color]
This mod allows Imperial Soliders to spawn with Penitus Oculatus armor.
In terms of lore I just assume that some Penitus Oculatus agents are relegated to Imperial Legion duty as punishment or simply to fill out the ranks. Also at the end of a certain storyline they are out of the job so instead of going on unemployment they join up with the Imperial Legion.

[color=#ffa500][size=6][font=times new roman,times,serif][b]Detailed Description[/b][/font][/size][/color]
Why you ask?
Cause damn the Penitus Oculatus!!
There's a storyine where they just... ah!! I hate 'em!! I wanted to eradicate there kind off the planet, put a smile on the throat of every last one of them. Thing is after a certain storyline they just spawn in a specific spot. I hate that. I wanna merk them all day, everyday, everywhere.
I'm using the vanilla armor sets so nothing new is added by this mod.
I'm using the following replacers:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6085/]Perfect Legionnaire - Imperial Armor Reforged 4-0[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/34873]Ali Bengali[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28404/?]PENITUS OCULATUS - RED - OUTFIT[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3478481]VeryFluffy4[/url]

[color=#ffa500][size=6][font=times new roman,times,serif][b]Technical Description[/b][/font][/size][/color]
The mod is basic as it gets. Contains two records: one of all the Penitus armor pieces and a vanilla leveled list of the possible Imperial outfits. Should be compatible with everything. Imperial Soliders from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12977]Immersive Patrols[/url],  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31264/?]OBIS[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9494//?]Warzones[/url] are affected by this mod.
I really wanted to add a condition where they can only spawn after the end of a certain storyline or when a specific NPC is GetDead() == 0.0 but there's no simple unscripted way to do it.
Tested the mod for months so it works right out of the box. No updates needed.

[color=#ffa500][size=6][font=times new roman,times,serif][b]Requirements[/b][/font][/size][/color]
Skyrim.esm
author: Job Van Dam -JVD-
